Loading on GitHub

Loading ding

Allows you to represent the behavior of a source that reports that Some work has been done. The Loading class is based on two sources, the first source starts the download process, the second completes it.

To better understand why the Loading class works this way, let's imagine that We need to make a request via FetchAPI. We have a client, which is the source of the API query result and this the client has a dependency on the source with the request. Therefore when a request appears in the source with a request, this is a signal that that loading has started, Loading switches to true when the Fetch Client gets the result - the download is completed, loading switches to false.
